channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell EMC Enterprise Storage Analytics for vRealize Operations
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell EMC Enterprise Storage Analytics for vRealize Operations

item.title: CVE-2021-43590|2024-08-04T04:03:08.437Z -- dell -- dell%20emc%20enterprise%20storage%20analytics%20for%20vrealize%20operations
item.description: Dell EMC Enterprise Storage Analytics for vRealize Operations, versions 4.0.1 to 6.2.1, contain a Plain-text password storage vulnerability. A local high privileged malicious user may potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to the disclosure of certain user credentials. The attacker may be able to use the exposed credentials to access the vulnerable application with privileges of the compromised account.
